item.title: WebTorrent
item.author: contact@softorage.com (Sanmay Joshi and Softorage contributors)
item.description: WebTorrent is a peer-to-peer (P2P) streaming torrent client written in JavaScript by Feross Aboukhadijeh. WebTorrent uses the same protocol as BitTorrent but uses a different transport. WebTorrent primarily relies on WebRTC connections, while BitTorrent uses TCP connections and UDP datagrams directly. Dev Documentation I FAQ I IRC
